Articles.Content:
just wondering if any amazing person has adopted the modular computer package mod, all i've found on it is 2 dead threads and an old old download of version 1.1 of the mod, gonna try it in 1.1.3 and see if it works but would really love it if someones taken care of the mod.

 

would like to report the mod does indeed work in 1.1.3

Edited September 27, 2016 by run1235
Actually, yes, I am currently working on new models, and expanding the selection of cards to support more mods.
